prefix_use_texts: To add or remove a prefix, use `add_prefix [prefix]` or `del_prefix [prefix]`.
not_in_vc_texts: You are not in a voice channel.
no_queue_texts: There are no songs in the queue.
no_api_credits_texts: No API Credits to use this.
insuff_perms_texts: You don't have permission to do this.
not_connected_texts: I'm not connected to a voice channel.
different_channel_texts: We are not in the same channel.
api_key_not_found: not found. Go into 'API_KEYS.txt' to set it.
invalid_time_format: Invalid time format. Please use either HH:MM:SS or MM:SS.
invalid_perm: Permission `%perm` is not a valid permission, use `available_perms`.
config_default:
➤ `search_limit` changed from `%sl` to `%def_sl`
➤ `recomm_limit` changed from `%rl` to `%def_rl`
➤ `custom_prefixes` changed from `%cust_p` to `%def_cust_p`
playlist_added_desc:
**%name** put **%title** in *%ch_name*!
A total of `%pl_length` songs have been added.
playlist_max_reached: The playlist has `%pl_length` videos, `%over` more than the maximum. The last `%discarded` videos were discarded.
not_loop_mode: `%mode` is not a loop mode, use `queue/all`, `shuffle/random`, `one` or `off`.
cannot_change_time_live: Cannot use `%command` on a live video.
missing_parameters:
ATTENTION: Missing parameter, file will be rewritten and parameters will be changed to default.
Press 'Enter' to proceed.
command_desc_help:
➤ Use: `help [nothing/command]`
➤ Aliases: `h`
➤ Description: Shows all commands, if a command is given it shows more info about it.
command_desc_play:
➤ Use: `play [query or url] [nothing/---1]`
➤ Aliases: `p`
➤ Description: Plays the given song. If ---1 is added at the end, a gif is added (try it!).
command_desc_leave:
➤ Use: `leave`
➤ Aliases: `l`, `dis`, `disconnect`, `d`
➤ Description: Disconnects the bot from the voice channel and clears the queue.
command_desc_skip:
➤ Use: `skip`
➤ Aliases: `s`, `next`
➤ Description: Skips to the next song.
command_desc_join:
➤ Use: `join`
➤ Aliases: `connect`
➤ Description: Connects to the voice channel.
command_desc_pause:
➤ Use: `pause`
➤ Aliases: `stop`
➤ Description: Pauses the song.
command_desc_queue:
➤ Use: `queue`
➤ Aliases: `q`
➤ Description: Shows the song queue.
command_desc_loop:
➤ Use: `loop [all/queue/shuffle/random/off]`
➤ Aliases: `lp`
➤ Description: Changes the loop mode; `all/queue` repeats the whole queue, `shuffle/random` randomize the next song when the current one is finished, `one` repeats the current song, `off` disables the loop.
command_desc_shuffle:
➤ Use: `shuffle`
➤ Aliases: `sf`, `random`
➤ Description: Randomizes the queue, then goes to the first song.
command_desc_info:
➤ Use: `np`
➤ Aliases: `info`, `nowplaying`, `playing`
➤ Description: Shows information of the current song.
command_desc_lyrics:
➤ Use: `lyrics [nothing/song name]`
➤ Aliases: `lyric`
➤ Description: Shows the lyrics of the current playing song, if given a name of a song it shows the lyrics to that song.
command_desc_songs:
➤ Use: `songs [nothing/NUM] [artist]`
➤ Aliases: `song`
➤ Description: Shows the top NUM songs of the given artist (10 if no NUM provided). If no artist is provided, it retrieves it from the current playing song.
command_desc_steam:
➤ Use: `steam [user]`
➤ Description: Shows the steam profile of the given user.
command_desc_remove:
➤ Use: `remove [song number]`
➤ Aliases: `rm`➤ Description: Removes the given song from the queue (use `queue` to see the songs and their numbers).
command_desc_goto:
➤ Use: `goto [song number]`
➤ Description: Goes to the chosen song.
command_desc_ping:
➤ Use: `ping`
➤ Description: Shows the bot latency.
command_desc_avatar:
➤ Use: `avatar`
➤ Aliases: `pfp`, `profile`
➤ Description: Shows your profile picture (HD).
command_desc_level:
➤ Use: `level`
➤ Aliases: `lvl`
➤ Description: Shows your level.
command_desc_chatgpt:
➤ Use: `chatgpt [message]`
➤ Aliases: `chat`, `gpt`
➤ Description: Answers with ChatGPT your message.
command_desc_seek:
➤ Use: `seek [time]`
➤ Aliases: `sk`
➤ Description: Goes to the given time. Time should be given in seconds or in format HH:MM:SS.
command_desc_chords:
➤ Use: `chords [nothing/song]`
➤ Description: Shows the chords of the current song, if given a song it shows the chords to that song.
command_desc_genre:
➤ Use: `genre [nothing/genre]`
➤ Aliases: `genres`, `recomm`, `recommendation`, `recommendations`
➤ Description: Shows songs of the given genre, if nothing (or available) is put, shows the list of genres.
command_desc_search:
➤ Use: `search [nothing/youtube/spotify] [query]`
➤ Aliases: `find`
➤ Description: Searches in youtube (default) or spotify the given query and shows the results.
command_desc_rewind:
➤ Use: `rewind`
➤ Aliases: `rw`, `r`, `back`
➤ Description: Goes back to the previous song.
command_desc_forward:
➤ Use: `forward [time]`
➤ Aliases: `fw`, `forwards`, `bw`, `backward`, `backwards`
➤ Description: Fast forwards or rewinds the song (depending if the time is positive/negative). Time should be given in seconds or in format HH:MM:SS.
command_desc_options:
➤ Use: `config [nothing/option] [value]`
➤ Aliases: `options`, `opt`, `cfg`
➤ Description: Changes the value of the given option to the given value, if no option is given, shows the list of options.
command_desc_fastplay:
➤ Use: `fastplay [song name or url]`
➤ Aliases: `fp`
➤ Description: Plays a song without having to choose.
command_desc_perms:
➤ Use: `perms`
➤ Aliases: `prm`
➤ Description: Shows %bot_name (the bot) current permissions in the server.
command_desc_add_prefix:
➤ Use: `add_prefix [prefix]`
➤ Aliases: `prefix`, `set_prefix`
➤ Description: Adds the given prefix to use it for commands.
command_desc_del_prefix:
➤ Use: `del_prefix [prefix]`
➤ Aliases: `remove_prefix`, `rem_prefix`
➤ Description: Removes the given prefix.
command_desc_add_perm:
➤ Use: `add_perm [name/ALL] [permission]`
➤ Description: Adds the given permission to the specified user (or all users).
command_desc_del_perm:
➤ Use: `del_perm [name/ALL] [permission]`
➤ Description: Removes the given permission from the specified user (or all users).
command_desc_available_perms:
➤ Use: `available_perms`
➤ Description: Shows the available permissions and the ones that are given by default to all users (admins get all permissions).
command_desc_pitch:
➤ Use: `pitch [semitones]`
➤ Aliases: `tone`
➤ Description: Changes the pitch of the current song in the given semitones. (positive: higher pitch, negative: lower pitch).
command_desc_lang:
➤ Use: `lang [language]`
➤ Aliases: `language`, `change_lang`, `change_language`
➤ Description: Changes the language of the bot (english: en, spanish: es).
command_commands:
➤ `help [nothing/command] (h)`
➤ `play [query or url] [nothing/---1] (p)`
➤ `leave (l, dis, disconnect, d)`
➤ `skip (s, next)`
➤ `join (connect)`
➤ `pause (stop)`
➤ `resume`
➤ `queue (q)`
➤ `loop [all/queue/shuffle/random/one/off] (lp)`
➤ `shuffle (sf, random)`
➤ `np (info, nowplaying, playing)`
➤ `lyrics [nothing/song name] (lyric)`
➤ `songs [nothing/NUM] [artist] (song)`
➤ `steam [user]`
➤ `remove [song number] (rm)`
➤ `goto [song number]`
➤ `search [nothing/youtube/spotify] [query] (find)`
➤ `ping`
➤ `avatar (pfp, profile)`
➤ `level (lvl)`
➤ `chatgpt [message] (chat, gpt)`
➤ `seek [time] (sk)`
➤ `chords [nothing/song name]`
➤ `genre [nothing/genre] (genres, recomm, recommendation, recommendations)`
➤ `forward [time] (fw, forwards, bw, backward, backwards)`
➤ `config [nothing/option] [value] (cfg, options, opt)`
➤ `fastplay [query or url] (fp)`
➤ `perms (prm)`
➤ `add_prefix [prefix] (prefix, set_prefix)`
➤ `del_prefix [prefix] (rem_prefix, remove_prefix)`
➤ `add_perm [name/ALL] [permission]`
➤ `del_perm [name/ALL] [permission]`
➤ `available_perms`
